quote: He had no ideal world of dead heroes, he knew little of the life of men in the past, he must find the beings to whom he could cling with loving admiration among those who came within speech of him.
quote_letters: HE HAD NO IDEAL WORLD OF DEAD HEROES HE KNEW LITTLE OF THE LIFE OF MEN IN THE PAST HE MUST FIND THE BEINGS TO WHOM HE COULD CLING WITH LOVING ADMIRATION AMONG THOSE WHO CAME WITHIN SPEECH OF HIM
